product_name: CRUA 34" 144Hz Ultrawide Curved Gaming Monitor ,WQHD 3440 * 1440P, 21:9 1500R Computer Monitor, 1ms(GTG) with Adaptive Sync, 99% SRGB, DP & HDMI Port, Black
short_description:
👑CRUA 34'' Ultrawide Gaming Monitor - Visual feast for office and gaming

CRUA 34'' 2K 144Hz delivers crisp, detailed images that run smoothly with reduced tearing and latency. 1500R Ultrawide Monitor provides an immersive visual experience. The bezel-less screen design and back RGB lighting effect can create a more immersive experience for a variety of scenarios such as gaming, work, and entertainment, enhancing efficiency and fun.

product_name: CRUA 32" 165Hz/180Hz Curved Gaming Monitor, FHD 1080P 1800R Computer Monitor, 100% SRGB, 1ms (GTG), AMD FreeSync,DP & HDMI Port, Black
short_description:
CRUA 32" 180Hz Curved Gaming Monitor-Top Visual Enjoyment

The CRUA 32-inch curved monitor offers superior visuals, with a 180Hz refresh rate, 1080P resolution, 99% colour gamut, and a 3000:1 contrast ratio. Its slim bezel expands the screen space, while AMD FreeSync prevents tearing. The monitor can be adjusted in angle (-5° to 15°) and connected to HDMI/DP ports with ease. The CRUA 32-inch curved monitor is an optimal choice for those seeking to elevate their gaming experience.

product_name: CRUA 24" 165Hz/180Hz Curved Gaming Monitor,FHD 1080P Computer Monitor,FreeSync,99% SRGB,Low Motion Blur-Black
short_description:
🎖️Epic Gaming Mate - CRUA 24" Curved Gaming Monitor

Enhance your visual experience with the CRUA CR240DM 24 inch monitor. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with 1080P resolution, a fast 180Hz refresh rate, and a professional-grade VA panel. AMD FreeSync technology ensures smooth gaming, while flicker-free and low blue light features prioritize eye comfort. Take your gaming to the next level with the CRUA CR240DM monitor.

product_name: CRUA 27 Inch FHD 100Hz Curved Monitor,1080P 1800R 99% sRGB PC Computer Monitor, Free-Sync,Flicker-less & Blue Light Filter,VGA,HDMI-White
short_description:
⭐CRUA 27" Curved Office monitor- Ultimate Office Experience

The CRUA White Office Monitor is the ideal device for enhancing your office and entertainment experience. This monitor offers 1080P resolution and 100Hz refresh rate, a 16:9 aspect ratio and 99% sRGB colour gamut, ensuring realistic and vivid images. You can easily adjust settings and functions to enjoy unparalleled performance and enrich your viewing journey. Its diverse functions can be easily enhanced to suit your specific needs effortlessly!

product_name: LG 27" FHD IPS 3-Side Borderless Monitor with Anti-Glare & AMD FreeSync™ (1920 x 1080) - 27MP40W-B
short_description: The LG 27” FHD IPS 3-Side Borderless Office Monitor with AMD FreeSync™ is here to meet all of your office needs! From sharp imagery to spot-on color, watch your brightest ideas come to life in Full High Res Definition. During both work and play, stay focused on the screen with smooth imaging and performance, thanks to a 75hz refresh rate. AMD FreeSync™ compatibility brings clearer, faster, smoother game play. Reduce screen tearing and minimize stutter and input lag to experience virtually seamless, fluid movement in high-resolution and fast-paced games. Connect multiple devices with both HDMI and D-Sub ports for complete flexibility. Less Is More - Stay immersed on the action with a virtually borderless screen on three sides that keeps you focused in the game.

product_name: LG 27" Monitor Full HD IPS MyView Green Smart Monitor with webOS and Built-in Speakers, Model 27SR50F-G
short_description: The LG MyView Smart Monitor is designed for multitasking while you work, play and watch. Connect the 27” display to a laptop, desktop or gaming console to immerse yourself in your work or games. Or, with the display’s LG webOS built-in, you can watch favorite shows from your favorite streaming apps.* See the quick response of an IPS Display. At 1920x1080 resolution, LG's FHD IPS Display features vibrant color and clarity at wide angles. Work through your projects with ease and efficiency. Thanks to webOS23, you can find your favorites fast with built-in access such as Netflix, the Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max and instant access to over 300+ free LG Channels with everything from comedy to movies to sports.** Smart on the inside and smart looking on the outside with a 3-side, virtually frameless design with a sleek, flat stand that looks great on a home office desktop. The screen’s tilt adjustment allows for viewing the screen they way you like it. With two HDMI ports and two USB ports connect with confidence knowing your devices will be compatible with this display. Finally, with two built-in 5W speakers, your movies, shows, music and even video conference calls will all sound as good as they look. *Internet connection and subscription to streaming services are required. Number of LG Channels subject to change.

product_name: LG 45" UltraGear™ QHD 1ms 200Hz Curved Gaming Monitor with USB Type-C™ - 45GR75DC-B
short_description: Make room on your desktop for the massive 45” curved (1500R) UltraGear QHD monitor with a 32:9 aspect ratio from LG. Play, stream and create on a high refresh rate display, in vivid color, on one screen at the same time. OnScreen Control1 supports both Picture-in-Picture (PiP) and Picture-by-Picture (PbP) allowing you to configure your monitor to show content from two separate input sources. Play, watch, stream or work from multiple input sources at the same time, on one screen. Choose from a variety of modes including Gamer, FPS or RTS to optimize display settings for the best view possible. This UltraGear display supports up to 95% of the DCI-P3 color gamut, expressing high-fidelity color paired with VESA DisplayHDR 600 delivering dynamic contrast and brightness on the QHD display. Gear up for smooth gameplay with a super responsive 200Hz display and a 1ms (GtG) response time. The faster speed lets you respond quickly to opponents and stay a step ahead of the competition.2  Finally, AMD FreeSync™ Premium Pro equips serious gamers with a fluid, virtually tear-free gaming experience. With at least 120hz refresh rate at minimum FHD resolution and low latency gameplay, you'll never miss a frame of the action as you play at peak performance.                                  1OnScreen Control software installation required. Visit Support on LG.com to download.                                                                               2Graphics card that supports HDMI 2.1, Display Port 1.4 or USB Type C required. Sold separately.

product_name: LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
short_description: Gaming Innovation Beyond Boundaries - The pinnacle of gaming monitors. Complete your battle station with a premium LG UltraGear™ Gaming Monitor. Built for gamers, it delivers the latest hardware, specs, ergonomics, sleek design and sensory experience. Smooth Motion for Gaming with 165Hz Refresh Rate in Comparison to 60Hz Refresh Rate. Responsiveness on a dime. With 1ms response time, gamers see fast action, obstacles and opponents in near real time for a clear advantage. This monitor supports HDR10 with sRGB 95% (Typ.) enabling realistic visual immersion with rich colors and contrast. Regardless of the battlefield, it can help gamers to see dramatic colors the game developers intended.

product_name: LG 45" UltraGear™ QHD 1ms 200Hz Curved Gaming Monitor with USB Type-C™ - 45GR75DC-B
short_description: Make room on your desktop for the massive 45” curved (1500R) UltraGear QHD monitor with a 32:9 aspect ratio from LG. Play, stream and create on a high refresh rate display, in vivid color, on one screen at the same time. OnScreen Control1 supports both Picture-in-Picture (PiP) and Picture-by-Picture (PbP) allowing you to configure your monitor to show content from two separate input sources. Play, watch, stream or work from multiple input sources at the same time, on one screen. Choose from a variety of modes including Gamer, FPS or RTS to optimize display settings for the best view possible. This UltraGear display supports up to 95% of the DCI-P3 color gamut, expressing high-fidelity color paired with VESA DisplayHDR 600 delivering dynamic contrast and brightness on the QHD display. Gear up for smooth gameplay with a super responsive 200Hz display and a 1ms (GtG) response time. The faster speed lets you respond quickly to opponents and stay a step ahead of the competition.2  Finally, AMD FreeSync™ Premium Pro equips serious gamers with a fluid, virtually tear-free gaming experience. With at least 120hz refresh rate at minimum FHD resolution and low latency gameplay, you'll never miss a frame of the action as you play at peak performance.                                  1OnScreen Control software installation required. Visit Support on LG.com to download.                                                                               2Graphics card that supports HDMI 2.1, Display Port 1.4 or USB Type C required. Sold separately.
